I use MYSQL for shard data on multiple machine then my data only get
by signle query it's very fast without join query, In this way I do not
have to worry about data spike ELASTICSEARCH: I use ES serve task
search, report. With this solution system can scale very fast.

complex very very easy. Save much more time for developement
and maintainence api.
